promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a chibi young mythical bear normal-type pokemon wearing diamond armor. It can be found in village-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, normal or bear. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Gemursa, a a chibi young mythical bear normal-type pokemon. It can be found in village-like environments It has the following abilities: Mega Punch. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "bear", "normal" or "Gemursa". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of normal-type pokemon, bear-like, mythical, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, pastel colors
generatedDescription: This petite mythical creature, often spotted in cozy hamlets, exhibits its might with a powerful Mega Punch and enjoys honey-filled days.
